channel.title: Im so confused
channel.description:
im trying to start a server. i set enviormental changes, have no-ip running, port forwarded using utorrent, changed ip in the client to mine, and put in exception to the 43594 port on mcafee (which took over windows firewall protection), and i have jdk 7 update 13.
my problem is when everything is running the server status checker says im online but i cant sign on to it, and my running script doesnt even say i attempted to.
help please.

kk then goto this website
canyouseeme.com
check make sure?
then make sure u changed everything right

item.title: Im so confused
item.dc:creator: @3lv3n_snip3r 3lv3n snip3r
item.description:
@3lv3n_snip3r wrote:

If you’re hosting it on your computer, you must use localhost or 127.0.0.1. For other players to connect to your server that aren’t on your network, they must use your IP or, if you have no-ip setup, they must use your no-ip. If a player wants to connect to your server that is on the same network, they must use your IPv4 address. You can find your IPv4 address by opening your cmd prompt and typing in ‘ipconfig’.

Read full topic
